product: Malware Scanner plugin and Web Application Firewall plugin for WordPress
shortDescription: The Malware Scanner plugin and the Web Application Firewall plugin for WordPress (both by MiniOrange) are vulnerable to privilege escalation due to a missing capability check on the mo_wpns_init() function in all versions up to, and including, 4.7.2 (for Malware Scanner) and 2.1.1 (for Web Application Firewall). This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to escalate their privileges to that of an administrator.
vulnerabilityName: MiniOrange Malware Scanner plugin and Web Application Firewall plugin for WordPress Priviledge Escalation Vulnerability
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
